website_summaries.verdict: While not the best quality leather, these fit the bill exactly for jazz dance practice sessions and even performances.
pros: Comfortable for occasional wear and less demanding dance practices
Soles are just right for turns
cons: Leather uppers smell pungent when new
Sizes run a bit large and they can be loose at the ankle

customer_reviews.title: Trust me. Awesome sturdy jazz shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these both as an instructor and for rehearsing shows. LOVE the suede sole. I have a ballroom shoe brush I have refreshed the suede with only once. The stretch arch hugs my foot just right, zero wearing on my big toe after a few months already. Under $20? Telling all my friends. Sizing: I wear 8/8.5 and went with 8.5. I have narrow heels, I added some dollar store heel grippers and gel forefoot pads to cushion for jumps. Great $2 customization investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tempeste

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Within a week, the side elastic had let out on both shoes. We needed a cheap jazz shoe for a musical, and we got what we paid for. My daughter said they were comfortable and got the job done (14 two hour rehersals and then four 90 minute performance) but would not hold up to a longer term dance use.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoe came true to size and fit. My daughter needed some for a school play. Considering she only needs them for a few days, I didn't want to spend a lot of money. They worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine State

customer_reviews.title: Half the price for the same shoes as the dance store!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needs these every year for a theater camp that requires them. These are exactly the same quality (in my non-dance mom opinion) as the $40 jazz shoes I stupidly bought from the local dance store the first year.
customer_reviews.author: All Day Mom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Daughter used these but felt something in bottom of them when she had them on. Had to send back. Quality was lacking but what’s to be expected with a name that has cheap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son who needed them for show rehearsals. I'm happy that they were inexpensive and fit him well. They are not doing very aggressive choreography so the shoes are holding up just fine. Can't say how they would work for more ambitious dancers.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Sole of the shoe started separating from the underside after about 3 weeks of moderate use. Hot glued them back together and that lasted for a few more weeks. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Jones

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Periodically ballet classes are followed by a jazz dancing segment, and these shoes filled the bill. They make her feet sweat, but so do her expensive ballet shoes.
customer_reviews.author: whatever

customer_reviews.title: The little shoe that could
customer_reviews.text: These shoes take a beating. The inside liner could be replaced it goes fast but the shoe keeps ticking and looks great. Survived whole dance season including a parade and summer intensive.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly E.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes the quality was just a bit thinner than expected. Overall the worked for my kid for what we needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Holt

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a well built shoe but not made for wide feet. It runs very narrow. So if you have a wide foot and just have to have these she’s most def go up some sizes.
customer_reviews.author: P Gower

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and is holding up
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking these shoes a lot. The sole does hurt a little on the heel - sort of digs in - but only when walking. Actual dancing is great.
customer_reviews.author: KimG

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. I bought these for my daughter. Perfect practice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LDAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed to be well made and fit well, but unfortunately only lasted one production before falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered for my dance class but they’re the ugliest shoes I own lol. For the price it’s good does it’s job ! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Gisele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value
customer_reviews.text: Single mom on a budget with a kiddo that dances competively. She grows quickly and we're constantly having to get better fitting shoes. These are a great value for the price! I will be purchasing these again when she goes through her next growth spurt.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit bigger, but they work just fine with thicker socks color has lasted long too where creases happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie King

customer_reviews.title: Sole quality poor
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the the sole is poor, it came off after using for few days.
customer_reviews.author: VIJAY

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe to use on stage. Has great flexibility for movement. It is sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: fun mama 0912

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are true to size. They are comfortable. I am able to spin while dancing with no problem. Very happy at this time. I have worn them about 5 times. So far they are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gentle Breeze

customer_reviews.title: They are Okay for price
customer_reviews.text: They are okay for the price but you can tell they're not going to be able to last very long so you might want to buy two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waist your money. The stitching came undone after 2-3 usea and they are not proper dance shoe material on the bottom. Too slick.
customer_reviews.author: Chi mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: this item arrived quicker than expected and is great quality. Very happy with the purchase. We purchased a little larger since my son's feet are still growing, but it still fits snuggly without squeezing.
customer_reviews.author: TOF

customer_reviews.title: Took a gamble but it paid off
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to like them, and she is picky about fit/feel, so i’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ward

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: These jazz shoes have felt on the bottom. My daughter slid all over the dance floor.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Chesson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made product. a wast of your money. don't buy this product...
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I really like these jazz shoes. They don't compare to shoes that I have had in the past, because they cost upwards of $40. I would recommend using these for short term, and not for any extensive use. They run large so I ordered half size down, but wish I would have done a full size. The material is also thin, but the felt soles are very nice for graceful dancing.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Dance shoe fits true to size. The bottom isn’t leather is more like a velvet bottom So was concerned about slipping on stage. But once they got broke in they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Minger

customer_reviews.title: Suede sole
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. Like the picture shows and unlike the description, the sole is made from suede. Size 8 women fit as expected. The price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Black

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: It got us through dance season and was a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Royster

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are good dance shoes. My son usually wears size 1 and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for dancing, and the size is true fit.
customer_reviews.text: I am taking line dance classes. This show is perfect for my quick turns. It’s very comfortable. I ordered by the shoe size I wear, and it is true to this size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes.lasted my girl her whole season of show chorus and she said they were just as comfortable as the $40 pairs.id recommend
customer_reviews.author: mrz.russell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Better to buy the more expensive shoes.
customer_reviews.author: carla lake

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to not look out of place at the dance studio. Great price, super comfortable and exactly as the product description states. I would purchase again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kmet

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unless your kid is extremely serious about dance, these are definitely the way to go for kids jazz shoes. They're reasonably priced and look very similar to the ones sold at my daughter's dance school for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jx3

customer_reviews.title: Very nice; run a bit wide
customer_reviews.text: They run a little big. But are in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Fit like gloves on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable as long as you don't need much space in the toebox. If you do, get a half size up. There is a bit of arch support which is really nice for stage shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Smogbuster

customer_reviews.title: Yeah...
customer_reviews.text: It was well, not the best idea to buy these, but that is because I never ended up using them and I chose different shoes to wear
customer_reviews.author: JayD Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought them big the shoes ran big for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo T.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Felt great, except the toes were a bit tight. They were my first dance shoe
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It came just in time for my high school's production of Newsies! Definitely great to dance in them! I would definitely buy theses in the future! They are very comfortable and easy to movie in!
customer_reviews.author: Tehillah Hill

customer_reviews.title: Yay.
customer_reviews.text: I love these they feel wonderful on my feet and cant wait to go to rehearsals to try them out. As a guy with size 13 street shoes my size 12 jazz shoes fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the $30 shoes. The breathable area is very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: These jazz shoes worked well and were good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Firmstone

customer_reviews.title: Jazz shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Last minute for drama class. Worked as expected. No problems and comfort was great.
customer_reviews.author: jperez

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great for dancing. If going to wear socks with them be sure to measure foot length with socks on, otherwise will fit very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Hope I.

customer_reviews.title: Add half a size to your order
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are about a 1/2 size too small. A little uncomfortable. I'm hoping they'll stretch out
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Runs huge
customer_reviews.text: These are bad quality. The sole was coming out on the inside and the sizes are off! No way near a child’s five! More like a women’s 7
customer_reviews.author: Hana Helms

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Comparable to more expensive pairs found in dance stores.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit about a size too big. It true tonsize.
customer_reviews.author: Schalanda

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: The soles on these shoes fell after after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. My daughter wants to wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Heaslet

customer_reviews.title: They are ok. Somewhat flimsy and ran too big ...
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. Somewhat flimsy and ran too big. I did not have time to exchange as my son needed them for a performance. He wore 2 prs. of thick socks to take up the room. Maybe size down 1/2 size for future.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Fields

Cheapdancing Super soft cotton lining are breathable, while Neoprene insoles hugs every curve of the arch.
Cheapdancing Premium leather with strong elasticity and durability, while provide best support for your feet.
Cheapdancing The jazz shoes feature a lightweight leather upper, and a split rubber soft outsole for amazingly easy turns. You can release yourself while dancing.
